text: Olof Langert in her workshop in 2014 Nils Olof Langert (11 June 1924 – 21 December 2016, Gothenburg, Sweden) was a Swedish painter and sculptor. Langert created monumental works for public spaces and buildings of the municipality of Gothenburg. His work is represented at the Museum of Modern Art of Stockholm, the Nationalmuseum, the Gothenburg Museum of Art, Borås, Malmö, Rønne (Denmark) and the Museum Folkwang in Essen, Germany. ==References== == External links == * International Standard Name Identifier Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:20th-century Swedish painters Category:20th-century Swedish sculptors Category:Swedish male sculptors
title: Olle Langert
